title: Generative AI-Enhanced Science Textbook PowerPoint Design Improvement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic PowerPoint Proficiency, Science Curriculum Knowledge, and Core Competencies for Pre-Service Teachers
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen competencies in educational material development through AI tools in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Generative AI (ChatGPT) and simple automation tools can convert text-heavy slides in science textbooks into designs with clear visual hierarchies.
By applying prompt engineering techniques, concise slide content aligned with educational objectives can be generated.
Automation workflows executable on mobile devices enable continuous improvement of existing materials to meet modern design standards.

resources: Simple Python script execution environment (e.g., Google Colab)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
